extension.summary: Up-to-the-moment commentary on all trending sports topics.
extension.description:
120 Sports is the ultimate destination for up-to-the-moment commentary on all trending sports topics. The digital-only broadcast network offers 50 hours of live content, plus more than 1,200 on-demand video clips, each week.
120 Sports is a first-of-its-kind network partnership involving multiple leagues and media properties created for the digital generation and the devices it uses most.
